reasons_to_visit.details: May offers ideal temperatures and sunshine for all outdoor activities, mountain hiking, and sightseeing.
Special cultural events and free museum access on May 18th, featuring exhibitions at the Regional Gallery and Liberec Castle.
Ještěd Mountain offers perfect conditions for hiking, mountain biking, and outdoor adventures with beautiful spring scenery.
Restaurant terraces and lakeside dining open with perfect weather for al fresco dining at places like Rybářská bašta.
Extended daylight hours provide more time for mountain activities, sightseeing, and outdoor exploration.

reasons_to_avoid.details: May marks the beginning of peak tourist season with larger crowds at major attractions like Ještěd Tower and Aquapark Babylon.
Accommodation and dining prices rise significantly as peak season approaches, especially near mountain attractions.
Popular restaurants and mountain activities require reservations well in advance.

activities: Cable car rides to Ještěd Tower

special_events.description: Free museum access and special cultural events
Peak conditions for hiking and mountain biking

local_tips: Visit Ještěd Mountain early morning to avoid crowds
Book restaurants and mountain activities well in advance
Check weather before planning mountain hikes
Reserve lakeside dining at Rybářská bašta for sunset views
Combine Ještěd Tower visit with spring mountain views
Bring water and sun protection for mountain activities
Check International Museum Day schedules for free access
